## Classifier.predictProbabilities() method

Uses the learned parameters to make predictions for the probability of an event based on a set of input data.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
predictProbabilities(data: Matrix<number>): Vector<number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  data | <code>Matrix&lt;number&gt;</code> | A [Vector](./vector.vector.md) whose rows are the observations in the test set |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector<number>`

## Remarks

Must be called after [Classifier.train()](./vector.classifier.train.md)
